Nutritional supplementation is extremely effective in improving resiliency. They help the mind and body rebuild from years of being overly stressed. Nutritional supplements will help reduce your physical and mental complaints while rebuilding your ability to handle life?s stressors.

The following nutrients have been selected specifically for you based on your questionnaire results

Adaptogens

Adaptogens are nutritional supplements that have been shown to bring your mind and body back into balance. They tend to reduce physical and emotional symptoms while providing a sense of well being. They are excellent for restoring physical and emotional vigor. We recommend choosing one of the following:

Maharishi Ayurveda Worry-Free Ayurvedic Medicine For Stress and Tension (60 Tablets X 1 Pack)

Maharishi Ayurveda Worry-Free Ayurvedic Medicine For Stress and Tension (60 Tablets X 1 Pack)

Maharishi Ayurveda Worry-Free Ayurvedic Medicine For Stress and Tension (60 Tablets X 1 Pack)

Neurotransmitter Balancers

Neurotransmitter balancers are one of the most important nutritional supplements to utilize when you have Burnout. Continued mental stress lowers the brain?s natural ability to deal with more stress and can lead to anxiety, decreased cognitive ability and a loss of joy for life. We recommend choosing one of the following

Maharishi Ayurveda Worry-Free Ayurvedic Medicine For Stress and Tension (60 Tablets X 1 Pack)
